Unnamed: 2: Definitions
Unnamed: 3: تعريف

Unnamed: 2: Used to indicate a reference number/site id given to a site in a published or unpublished gazetteer or survey database.  The source of the reference must also be listed as an Information Resource and linked to the record.

Where a site is designated in an official list or register (e.g. UNESCO World Heritage Site), the name/reference under which it is registered should be listed. World Heritage Sites should be entered using the format “World Heritage List” plus the list number, e.g. World Heritage List 287. If the site name listed on the World Heritage List differs from the usual toponyms, list it as a separate entry, also with the Designation Type, e.g. “Rock-Art Sites of Tadrart Acacus”. The type of designation must be listed under the resource's 'Designation' field
All known names, historical and modern, and in any language should be listed, including alternative spellings, if applicable.
Definitions
Unnamed: 3: تعريف

Unnamed: 2: A place or area of archaeological/heritage significance where human activity is represented by material culture. This is the 'default' category to which records should be assigned if you are unsure about its classification.

A place, area, or feature of archaeological/heritage significance which comprises part of a larger place/area/feature of significance, such as a Landscape or Archaeological Site. Records given this classification should always be related to a 'parent' record.
An area which contains one or more places, areas, and/or features of shared or similar archaeological/heritage significance, but which may be physically separated and spread over a large area
A place, area, or feature of archaeological/heritage significance which is located within a contemporary urban area, and which is often (but not necessarily) still in current use

A building or other construction of archaeological/heritage significance, which is still, at least partially, standing. This term should be used only when the entire record is documenting this type of heritage, not for cases where structures just happen to present as part of a larger or more complex site. E.g. an ancient city may have many individual buildings which can be recorded as "Structural Heritage" if given individual records, but the city itself is made of many different types of features, and should be recorded overall as an "Archaeological Site".

Definitions
Unnamed: 3: تعريف

Unnamed: 2: Relating to the farming of land and/or the rearing of animals
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بزراعة الأرض، أو رعي الحيوانات بها

Unnamed: 2: Relating to the security or protection of people or an area, but not military in nature
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بالأمن أو بحماية الناس أو حماية منطقة، ولكن ليس ذا طبيعة حربية

Unnamed: 2: Relating to the habitation of people
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة باستيطان وسكن الناس

Unnamed: 2: Relating to activities which are largely for pleasure or enjoyment
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بأنشطة يغلب عليها الجانب الترفيهي

Unnamed: 2: Relating to activities concerning the memorialisation of individuals, events and/or the treatment of the dead
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بتخليد ذكرى أشخاص، أو أحداث، أو له علاقة بالتعامل مع الموت والموتى

Unnamed: 2: Relating to the exploitation of (mostly) non-domesticated species
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بالاستثمار في كائنات حية (عادة في غير الدواب أو الحيوانات المستأنسة)

Unnamed: 2: Relating to the management and movement of water
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بإدارة وحركة المياه

Unnamed: 2: Relating to the production of goods or other commodities, at large or small scale
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بانتاج البضائع، على نطاق كبير أو صغير

Unnamed: 2: Relating to the organisation and provision of facilities and services, particularly those associated with the movement of people, animals and goods, which are necessary for a society to function
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بتنظيم وإتاحة الخدمات، خصوصاً تلك المتعلقة بحركة الناس والحيوانات والبضائع، والتي يحتاجها كل مجتمع في حياته اليومية

Unnamed: 2: Relating to the sea, in particular shipping and/or the exploitation of maritime resources where these resources cannot be further defined.
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بالبحر، خصوصاً الشحن والاستثمار في مصادر بحرية، في الحالات التي لا يمكن فيها تحديد المصادر

Unnamed: 2: Relating to an organised and/or official group of armed forces
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بقوات حربية منظمة أو رسمية

Unnamed: 2: Relating to facilities and services which are intended for use by the community as a whole. Often, but not necessarily officially provided or sanctioned e.g. markets, courthouses, official/government etc.
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بالخدمات للمجتمع ككل. والتي عادة، وليس دائماً، تكون رسمية، مثال الأسواق، المحاكم، الإدارات الحكومية، وغيرها

Unnamed: 2: Relating to activities of a ritual nature
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بأنشطة تعبدية

Unnamed: 2: Relating to structures which serve no functional purpose except to express a statement, usually relating to wealth, status, power etc.
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة ببناء لا يخدم وظيفة محددة وإنما يعبر عن وضع أو مكانة معينة، وعادة ما يكون له علاقة بالثروة أو السلطة

Unnamed: 2: Relating to facilities and or services which are predominantly economically orientated or mercantile in nature.
Unnamed: 3: له علاقة بخدمات لها طبيعة اقتصادية وتجارية
